price: 102 Jour où il sera soufflé dans la Corne et où Nous rassemblerons les criminels, les visages livides[827].
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri wanaḥshuru al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan
